name: ZELDA (Raul Fernandes)
description:
Run away from the monsters and try to kill them all!!!
This is a funny game for you to challenge yourself. How long do you take to kill all the monsters???
Use W, A, S, D to move the player
SPACE to jump
Aim and shoot with the mouse
You can shoot with X too
My advice? Don't waste your bullets!!!
Good Luck
